info.name: HTTP Missing Security Headers
author: socketz
geeknik
g4l1t0
convisoappsec
kurohost
dawid-czarnecki
forgedhallpass
info.description: This template searches for missing HTTP security headers. The impact of these missing headers can vary.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.bercynumerique.finances.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Cache-Control: max-age=600, public Content-Language: fr Content-Security-Policy: default-src https: 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline'; object-src https: ; child-src https: platform.twitter.com; img-src https: data: Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Date: Sun, 29 May 2022 01:59:58 GMT Etag: "1653315780-gzip" Expires: Sun, 19 Nov 1978 05:00:00 GMT Last-Modified: Mon, 23 May 2022 14:23:00 GMT Referrer-Policy: origin Server: nginx Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=34560000; includeSubDomains Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1 Vary: Cookie,Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Drupal-Cache: HIT X-Drupal-Dynamic-Cache: MISS X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Proxy-Cache: EXPIRED X-Ua-Compatible: IE=edge X-Xss-Protection: 1;mode=block Accueil | Bercy numérique
Skip to main navigation Skip to content

Main navigation

  • L'information en continu
  • Vivre le numérique à Bercy
  • Tester ma culture numérique
  • Aller plus loin avec la formation

À la Une

Quel rôle pour le numérique dans la vie politique ? -
10/05/22
GUIDE Bonnes pratiques numérique responsable pour les organisations -
05/05/22
Matériel informatique : rendre le numérique écologiquement soutenable -
04/05/22
« Les technologies numériques devraient être des supports de savoirs, pas des moyens de manipulation » -
02/05/22
La numérisation des démarches administratives, une priorité selon les agents publics -
21/04/22
Précédent Pause Suivant

L'information en continu

Retrouvez toutes les actualités du numérique

Vivre le numérique à Bercy

Témoignages, retours d'expériences, bonnes pratiques sur la transformation numérique

Tester ma culture numérique

info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

response:

Connection: close
Accept-Ranges: bytes
Cache-Control: max-age=1209600
Content-Security-Policy: default-src https: 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline'; object-src https: ; child-src https: platform.twitter.com; img-src https: data:
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8
Date: Sun, 29 May 2022 02:00:08 GMT
Etag: "6b4-5b125abee9800-gzip"
Expires: Wed, 01 Jun 2022 09:36:17 GMT
Last-Modified: Thu, 08 Oct 2020 09:44:00 GMT
Referrer-Policy: origin
Server: nginx
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=34560000; includeSubDomains
Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1
Vary: Accept-Encoding
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Proxy-Cache: HIT
X-Xss-Protection: 1;mode=block

#
# robots.txt
#
# This file is to prevent the crawling and indexing of certain parts
# of your site by web crawlers and spiders run by sites like Yahoo!
# and Google. By telling these "robots" where not to go on your site,
# you save bandwidth and server resources.
#
# This file will be ignored unless it is at the root of your host:
# Used:    http://example.com/robots.txt
# Ignored: http://example.com/site/robots.txt
#
# For more information about the robots.txt standard, see:
# http://www.robotstxt.org/robotstxt.html

User-agent: *
# CSS, JS, Images
Allow: /core/*.css$
Allow: /core/*.css?
Allow: /core/*.js$
Allow: /core/*.js?
Allow: /core/*.gif
Allow: /core/*.jpg
Allow: /core/*.jpeg
Allow: /core/*.png
Allow: /core/*.svg
Allow: /profiles/*.css$
Allow: /profiles/*.css?
Allow: /profiles/*.js$
Allow: /profiles/*.js?
Allow: /profiles/*.gif
Allow: /profiles/*.jpg
Allow: /profiles/*.jpeg
Allow: /profiles/*.png
Allow: /profiles/*.svg
# Directories
Disallow: /core/
Disallow: /profiles/
# Files
Disallow: /README.txt
Disallow: /web.config
# Paths (clean URLs)
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /comment/reply/
Disallow: /filter/tips
Disallow: /node/add/
Disallow: /search/
Disallow: /user/register/
Disallow: /user/password/
Disallow: /user/login/
Disallow: /user/logout/
# Paths (no clean URLs)
Disallow: /index.php/admin/
Disallow: /index.php/comment/reply/
Disallow: /index.php/filter/tips
Disallow: /index.php/node/add/
Disallow: /index.php/search/
Disallow: /index.php/user/password/
Disallow: /index.php/user/register/
Disallow: /index.php/user/login/
Disallow: /index.php/user/logout/
# webform
Disallow: /files/webform/
Disallow: /recherche-resultat/
Disallow: /files/webform
Disallow: /recherche-resultat

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
